CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(LastModifiedDate)), ( 5 * FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(TODAY() - DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate), 7)) ) + ( CASE( MOD(DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate) - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, 0, 0 ) * ( 24 - VALUE(MID(TEXT(LastModifiedDate), 12, 2)) - (VALUE(MID(TEXT(LastModifiedDate), 15, 2)) / 60.0) ) / 24.0 ) + ( CASE( MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, 0, 0 ) * ( VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 12, 2)) + (VALUE(MID(TEXT(NOW()), 15, 2)) / 60.0) ) / 24.0 ) - 1, NULL )
CustomField.label: Business Days Since Last Modified
